import React from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import useInput from "../hooks/useInput"; import { postUserRegister } from "../state/registration"; const Register = () => { const dispatch= useDispatch() const name = useInput(""); const email = useInput(""); const password = useInput(""); const handleSumbit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); dispatch(postUserRegister({name: name.value, email: email.value, password: password.value})) }; return (

Register

); }; export default Register; /*
